room_title: Escape room "Through the Looking Glass" by Escape Room Missouri City in Houston
review: Fun fun fun-take a group, you NEED different perspectives. Very nice helpful fun staff!

room_title: Escape room "Through the Looking Glass" by Escape Room Missouri City in Houston
review: We love escape rooms, because they are a fun challenge and ideal for the entire family. This was our first time here, and we would definitely return. Escape Room Games has professional and friendly staff, as well as a great location with a nearby coffee shop/wine bistro/restaurant.

room_title: Escape room "Through the Looking Glass" by Escape Room Missouri City in Houston
review: These escape rooms are so much fun!! I've done quite a few escape rooms in California and took a bunch of first-timers to here when I came to visit in February -we did the Baker Street one - it was challenging but so much fun!! This time around we did the Looking Glass which is now my new favorite room - the room is super cute and well thought out. Definitely recommend this place to newcomers and experienced ones
